can.message:
In the ocean it will take up to 200 years for an aluminum can to decompose. 

Select the Trash-magnet to clean up the ocean!

africa.message: Did you know that Africa is the birthplace of famed lion "Mufasa"

scandinavia.message: In Scandinavia people are cold during the winter, and warm during the summer!

oceania.message:
In Oceania, time moves backwards. 
 and so do you!

america.message: Did you know that America is an awful place to live
